Calculate the actual age between two dates

calc_age.Rd

Calculate the actual age between two dates

calc_age(birth_date, onset_date)

Arguments

birth_date

Birth date.

onset_date

Event date.

Value

Vector of ages.

Examples

sdate <- as.Date("1960-01-01")
edate <- as.Date("1980-12-31")
bdate <- sample(seq(sdate, edate, by = "1 day"), 100, replace = TRUE)
event <- sample(seq(as.Date("2020-01-01"),
                    as.Date("2023-07-08"),
                    by = "1 day"),
                100, replace = TRUE)
ages <- calc_age(bdate, event)
ages
#>   [1] 40 53 43 56 43 55 42 44 53 56 41 56 45 44 44 59 58 58 54 45 44 58 42 47 48
#>  [26] 54 46 51 44 54 42 51 49 49 50 63 57 41 56 56 49 59 41 54 40 58 47 44 59 42
#>  [51] 52 59 58 48 42 56 58 60 44 58 54 43 46 44 44 45 58 47 45 48 41 49 55 40 41
#>  [76] 42 58 56 56 39 51 62 58 50 54 52 59 46 62 54 57 49 43 57 50 41 49 43 42 49
